debates.showAs: Local Authority Public Administration Bill 2023: Second Stage [Private Members]
Local Authority Public Administration Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to compel local authorities to provide members of the public and public representatives with substantive replies to written communications within a prescribed period of time and to allow for local authority chief executives to appear before the Public Accounts Committee of Dáil Éireann.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun iallach a chur ar údaráis áitiúla freagraí substainteacha ar chumarsáidí scríofa a sholáthar do dhaoine den phobal agus d’ionadaithe poiblí laistigh de thréimhse ama fhorordaithe agus chun a cheadú do phríomhfheidhmeannaigh údarás áitiúil láithriú os comhair an Choiste um Chuntais Phoiblí Dháil Éireann.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Riarachán Poiblí Údarás Áitiúil, 2023

debates.showAs: Road Traffic (Bus and Cycle Lane) (Amendment) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Road Traffic Act 2010 to make provision for the use of digitally recorded data from electronic devices of footage and/or other readings from road traffic safety cameras/closed circuit television cameras as evidence of the unlawful entry into or parking in a bus lane or cycle track and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thrácht ar Bhóithre, 2010 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le sonraí arna dtaifeadadh go digiteach, ó fheistí leictreonacha, de thaifeadtaí scannáin agus/nó léamha eile ó cheamaraí sábháilteachta um thrácht ar bhóithre nó ó cheamaraí teilifíse ciorcaid iata a úsáid mar fhianaise ar dhul isteach neamhdhleathach nó ar locadh neamhdhleathach i lána bus nó i raon rothar agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Road Traffic (Bus and Cycle Lane) (Amendment) Bill 2019
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thrácht ar Bhóithre (Lána Bus agus Rothar) (Leasú), 2019

debates.showAs: Dublin Transport Authority (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Dublin Transport Authority Act 2008 to provide that no further competitively tendered for contracts of public bus services and/or public passenger transport services in excess of those competitively tendered for contracts which the National Transport Authority is currently entered into shall take place until such time as a period of five years has elapsed from the date of enactment of this Act and a full review of said entered into competitively tendered for contracts has been carried out by the Minister for Transport, Tourism and Sport; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Údarás Iompair Bhaile Átha Cliath, 2008 chun socrú a dhéanamh nach ndéanfar aon chonarthaí tairisceana iomaíche breise i leith seirbhísí poiblí bus agus/nó seirbhísí iompair phoiblí do phaisinéirí, de bhreis ar na conarthaí tairisceana iomaíche sin atá déanta i láthair na huaire ag an Údarás Náisiúnta Iompair, a chur ar bun, go dtí cibé tráth a bheidh tréimhse cúig bliana caite ó dháta achtaithe an Achta seo agus a bheidh athbhreithniú iomlán déanta ag an Aire Iompair, Turasóireachta agus Spóirt ar na conarthaí tairisceana iomaíche sin atá déanta agus a dúradh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Údarás Iompair Bhaile Átha Cliath (Leasú) (Uimh. 2), 2018

debates.showAs: Dublin Transport Authority (Amendment) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Dublin Transport Authority Act 2008 to provide that no direct award public service contracts of public transport passenger services in excess of ten per cent of said service contracts currently entered into with a public transport operator, (and other than with Dublin Bus, Bus Éireann and Iarnród Éireann) shall take place until such time as a period of five years has elapsed from the date of commencement of said contracts and a full review of same has been carried out and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá  ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Údarás Iompair Bhaile Átha Cliath, 2008 chun socrú a dhéanamh nach ndéanfar aon chonarthaí seirbhíse poiblí dír-dhámhachtana i leith seirbhísí iompair phoiblí do phaisinéirí, ar mó iad ná deich faoin gcéad de na conarthaí seirbhíse sin a dúradh agus atá déanta i láthair na huaire le hoibritheoir iompair phoiblí (seachas le Bus Átha Cliath, le Bus Éireann agus le hIarnród Éireann), a chur ar bun, go dtí cibé tráth a bheidh tréimhse cúig bliana caite ó dháta thosach feidhme na gconarthaí sin a dúradh agus a bheidh athbhreithniú iomlán déanta ar an gcéanna, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Údarás Iompair Bhaile Átha Cliath (Leasú), 2018

debates.showAs: Road Traffic (Regulation of Rickshaws) (Amendment) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Taxi Regulation Act 2013 and the Road Traffic Act 1961 to make provision for the regulation, by the National Transport Authority, of rickshaws in cities, counties and municipal districts and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Rialáil Tacsaithe, 2013 agus an Achta um Thrácht ar Bhóithre, 1961 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir leis an Údarás Náisiúnta Iompair do rialáil ricseánna i gcathracha, i gcontaetha agus i gceantair bhardasacha agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thrácht ar Bhóithre (Ricseánna a Rialáil) (Leasú), 2018

debates.showAs: Irish Coast Guard Authority Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision for the establishment of a body to be known as the Irish Coast Guard Authority, replacing that division of the Department of Transport, Tourism and Sport known as the Irish Coast Guard, to designate said body as a principal response agency to engage in the management and co-ordination of responses to major emergency events within the State and which shall serve in co-operation with An Garda Síochána, the Health Service Executive, local authorities and other relevant bodies as may be prescribed by the Minister and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le comhlacht a bhunú ar a dtabharfar Údarás Gharda Cósta na hÉireann, a chuirfear in ionad an rannáin sin den Roinn Iompair, Turasóireachta agus Spóirt ar a dtugtar Garda Cósta na hÉireann, d'ainmniú an chomhlachta sin mar phríomhghníomhaireacht freagartha a bheidh ag gabháil do bhainistiú agus comhordú na bhfreagairtí do mhórtheagmhais éigeandála laistigh den Stát agus a fhónfaidh i gcomhar leis an nGarda Síochána, le Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte, le húdaráis áitiúla agus le comhlachtaí iomchuí eile de réir mar a fhorordóidh an tAire agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Údarás Gharda Cósta na hÉireann, 2018

debates.showAs: Sale of Illicit Goods Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Sale of Illicit Goods Bill 2017: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Sale of Illicit Goods Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Sale of Illicit Goods Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make it an offence to purchase illicit alcohol, illicit tobacco and illicit solid fuel; to make it an offence to purchase such goods from an unregistered or unlicensed retailer; to provide for the imposition of a penalty in respect of such offences; to provide for an on-the-spot fine in respect of such offences; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh cion d'alcól aindleathach, tobac aindleathach agus breosla soladach aindleathach a cheannach; do dhéanamh cion d'earraí den sórt sin a cheannach ó mhiondíoltóir neamhchláraithe nó neamhcheadúnaithe; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le pionós a fhorchur i leith cionta den sórt sin; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le fíneáil ar an láthair i leith cionta den sórt sin; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhíol Earraí Aindleathacha, 2017

debates.showAs: Electricity (Supply) (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to reduce restrictions on the power of the Electricity Supply Board to carry out works concerning the levels on the Shannon Lakes (Lough Derg, Lough Ree and Lough Allen), to amend the Electricity (Supply) (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1934 and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do laghdú srianta ar chumhacht Bhord Soláthair an Leictreachais oibreacha a dhéanamh maidir leis na leibhéil ar Lochanna na Sionainne (Loch Deirgeirt, Loch Rí agus Loch Aillionn), do leasú an Achta Leictreachais (Soláthar) (Leasú) (Uimh. 2), 1934 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: Shannon River Agency Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to co-ordinate the activities of authorities, agencies, and bodies connected with the protection, conservation, management, water management and control of pollution of the Shannon river catchment, to establish a body to be known as the Shannon River Agency, to define its functions, and to provide for other matters connected with the matters aforesaid
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chomhordú gníomhaíochtaí údarás, gníomhaireachtaí agus comhlachtaí a bhaineann le cosaint, caomhnú, bainistíocht, bainistíocht uisce agus rialú ar thruailliú Abhantrach na Sionainne, do bhunú comhlachta ar a dtabharfar Gníomhaireacht Abhainn na Sionainne, do mhíniú a fheidhmeanna, agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le nithe eile a bhaineann leis na nithe réamhráite
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ghníomhaireacht Abhainn na Sionainne, 2016

debates.showAs: Child Care (Guardian Ad Litem) Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend section 26 of the Child Care Act 1991 (as amended), to empower the Minister for Children to make regulations by Ministerial orders under the aforementioned section, to amend section 26(4) to grant a court the discretion to retain a guardian ad litem in circumstances where a child becomes party to proceedings, and to amend section 26(10) of the Child Care Act 1991 (as amended), to provide judicial guidelines for the appointment of a guardian ad litem in child care proceedings
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú alt 26 den Acht um Chúram Leanaí, 1991 (arna leasú), do chumhachtú don Aire Leanaí rialacháin a dhéanamh le horduithe ón Aire faoin alt réamhluaite, do leasú alt 26(4) chun rogha a thabhairt do chúirt caomhnóir ad litem a áirithiú in imthosca ina dtagann leanbh chun bheith ina  pháirtí nó ina páirtí in imeachtaí, agus do leasú alt 26(10) den Acht um Chúram Leanaí, 1991 (arna leasú), chun treoirlínte breithiúnacha a sholáthar i dtaca le caomhnóir ad litem a cheapadh in imeachtaí cúraim leanaí
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chúram Leanaí (Caomhnóir Ad Litem), 2015

debates.showAs: Cyberbullying Bill 2013: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to address and prevent cyberbullying
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun aghaidh a thabhairt ar chibearbhulaíocht agus chun í a chosc

debates.showAs: Child Care (Amendment) (No. 3) Bill 2013: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Child Care Act 1991 (as amended) so as to enable any person to apply to the court seeking an order or direction in respect of a child who is not subject to the proceedings brought under the Guardianship of Infants Act 1964, the Child Care Act 1991 or any subsequent legislation dealing with similar proceedings, but who has been brought to the attention of the Health Service Executive, where there are reasonable grounds for believing the child in question is not receiving adequate care and protection
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Chúram Leanaí, 1991 (arna leasú) chun a chumasú d'aon duine iarratas a dhéanamh chuig an gcúirt ina lorgaítear ordú nó ordachán i leith leanbh nach bhfuil faoi réir na n-imeachtaí arna dtionscnamh faoin Acht um Chaomhnóireacht Naíon, 1964, faoin Acht um Chúram Leanaí, 1991 nó faoi aon reachtaíocht ina dhiaidh sin ina bpléitear le himeachtaí comhchosúla, ach is leanbh a bhfuil aird Fheidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte tarraingthe air nó uirthi, i gcás go bhfuil forais réasúnacha ann chun a  chreidiúint nach bhfuil an leanbh atá i gceist ag fáil cúram agus cosaint leordhóthanach

debates.showAs: Mental Health (Anti-Discrimination) Bill 2013: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision, in the context of evident and persistent unfair discrimination against persons who have been diagnosed with a mental illness or who have in the past been diagnosed with a mental illness, for the protection of certain classes of persons having been diagnosed with a mental illness and to prohibit the discrimination against such persons and to provide for the grant of certain protections in matters of contract law
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú, i gcomhthéacs idirdhealú éagothrom atá follasach agus leanúnach in aghaidh daoine ar fáthmheasadh go bhfuil tinneas meabhrach orthu nó ar fáthmheasadh san am atá caite go raibh tinneas meabhrach orthu, chun aicmí áirithe daoine ar fáthmheasadh go bhfuil tinneas meabhrach orthu a chosaint agus do thoirmeasc idirdhealú in aghaidh na ndaoine sin agus do dhéanamh socrú chun cosaintí áirithe a dheonú i ndáil le nithe a bhaineann le dlí na gconarthaí

debates.showAs: Child Care (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2013: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend penalty provisions under section 57 of the Child Care Act 1991 (as amended), and the regulations made by Ministerial orders there within
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú forálacha pionóis faoi alt 57 den Acht um Chúram Leanaí, 1991 (arna leasú), agus na rialachán arna ndéanamh le horduithe ón Aire sa chéanna

debates.showAs: In Camera Rule in Childcare and Family Law Proceedings Bill 2013: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend section 29 of the Child Care Act 1991, as amended by the Child Care (Amendment) Act 2007 and section 46(2) of the Child Care (Amendment) Act 2011 to deal with the application of the in camera rule under the Child Care Act 1991 and to amend section 40 of the Civil Liability and Courts Act 2004 to deal with the application of the in camera rule in certain family law proceedings
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú alt 29 den Acht um Chúram Leanaí, 1991, arna leasú leis an Acht um Chúram Leanaí (Leasú), 2007 agus le halt 46(2) den Acht um Chúram Leanaí (Leasú), 2011 chun déileáil le feidhm na rialach in camera faoin Acht um Chúram Leanaí, 1991 agus do leasú alt 40 den Acht um Dhliteanas Sibhialta agus Cúirteanna, 2004 chun déileáil le feidhm na rialach in camera in imeachtaí dlí teaghlaigh áirithe
bill.shortTitleEn: In Camera Rule in Childcare and Family Law Proceedings Bill 2013
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an Riail in Camera in Imeachtaí Cúraim Leanaí agus Dlí Teaghlaigh, 2013

debates.showAs: Electoral (Amendment) (Political Donations) Bill 2011: Second Stage (resumed)
Electoral (Amendment) (Political Donations) Bill 2011: Order for Second Stage
Electoral (Amendment) (Political Donations) Bill 2011: Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to restrict the making of donations for political purposes by companies, trade unions, societies or building societies, to amend the law relating to the disclosure of donations to political parties and individuals, to provide for the auditing of the accounts of political parties and to implement the recommendations relating to political funding contained within the Second Report of the Tribunal of Inquiry into Payments to Politicians
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur srian le cuideachtaí, ceardchumainn, cumainn nó cumainn fhoirgníochta do thabhairt síntiús chun críoch polaitíochta, do leasú an dlí a bhaineann le síntiúis le páirtithe polaitíochta agus le pearsana aonair a nochtadh, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cuntais páirtithe polaitíochta a iniúchadh agus do chur i ngníomh na moltaí a bhaineann le maoiniú polaitíochta atá sa Dara Tuarascáil ón mBinse Fiosrúcháin maidir le hÍocaíochtaí le Polaiteoirí
